Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected Result:
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.
The accounts options menu popover is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to Security & privacy in the Settings menu.
Expected Result: The Security & privacy settings are displayed.

Test Steps: Enable Show incoming transactioins for the current selected network.

Expected Result: The account menu popover is shown.
The Add account popover is shown.

Test Steps: Click the Add a new Ethereum account button.
Specify an account name and create the account.

Expected Result: The account menu popover is shown.

Test Steps: Switch back to the initial account.
Select an account from Your accounts.

Expected Result:
The recipient's hexadecimal address is shown.
The specified amount is shown.
The estimated gas details are shown.
The total amount is shown.

The Send transaction appears in the activity list.
The amount is shown in the activity list item.
The account menu popover is shown.

Test Steps: Switch back to newly created account.

Expected Result:
The Receive transaction appears in the activity list.
The amount is shown in the activity list item.
The transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.
